item.title: Female Models
item.description:
This is an opening for attractive models who are looking for excellent and long term work. I am currently shooting for the launch of a private upscale adult website that showcases beautiful women of all ethnicity.
Details:
1) Must be between the ages of 18-28
2) Must be open to taking tastefully done lingerie/nude/semi-nude photos/video.
3) The shoot will be a combination of photos and video.
4) The pay is a flat fee of $500-$1000 and will last approximately 1-2 hours.
5) If done well, it can turn into a long term opportunity.
6) Must be in physically fit condition.
7) Race does not matter.
8) Must submit at least two full body photos via email, the sexier the better as the photos you submit will be the deciding factor for selection.
Positions are limited, I'm only looking for 5 models at this time.

item.title: Catalogue MAGAZINE launching

Producers, agencies, casting directors are all apart of this magazine and may take you on for their next big project. Interested applicant should kindly send 1 head shot and 1 full body shoot, no topless/nude pictures . Must be 18 years and above.

item.title: Web Cam Models Wanted

Must have a private place to work, a webcam, computer, and high-speed internet Payments are weekly for the previous week worked, and we offer payments by check, direct deposit, Payoneer, Alert Pay, or Paxum Please send your most recent photo (Non-Nude), as well as your availability

item.title: My Strange Addiction
item.description:
Do you have a friend or family member suffering from a strange addiction? It's hard to watch someone you love battle an addiction, especially when that baddiction seems strange, unusual and completely unstoppable. The major docu series profiles those suffering from addictions that may seem unusual, but nonetheless, very harmful and challenging. We allow friends and family members to discuss the addiction in a safe and controlled environment and then offer help to those suffering from an addiction.
If you have someone in your life that is ingesting or smelling something dangerous or engaging in odd behavior that is damaging their quality of life, please contact us so we can help.

item.title: On Air Talent
item.description:
AXSLive - "Fiercely Independent"
The world's music and pop culture voice beginning July 2012...
Breaking new ground.
We are looking for on air "Leads" in Atlanta. We want you to take us into the story LIVE, into the music LIVE, into the event LIVE every time, EVERY day. We are taking LIVE TV in a different direction.
If you are an actor or comedian with strong improv skills bring it on!
Radio personalities - you handle live all day long, we are open to you!
Bloggers, Vloggers, if you are passionate and have the ability to handle yourself on camera and bring the story to the screen LIVE - talk to us!
If you are professional and passionate about what you do let us know, show us what you want the world to see - musicians, artists, fashion designers, chefs, performers, trendsetters, entertainers - everyone with a strong voice may have a place at AXSLive.
Help us create something new. We're looking for contributors at all levels, in all disciplines to be part of a team that creates a new way of bringing music, arts, entertainment and popular culture to all platforms.
Become part of the AXSLive adventure.
EOE. Good benefits. All submissions must be electronic and include the following: small head shot, short bio, links to reels, full resume and credits and professional references. Please note the CITY you are applying for in the subject line.

item.title: TV show
item.description:

Please submit the following info and I will give you a call with more details!
NAME AGES OF FAMILY MEMBERS PHONE PHOTO CITY YOU LIVE please answer the following questions... BRIEFLY tell me a little about your family. Have you ever traveled outside the USA. If so, to where and why? Do you believe America is the best country? Do you have extended family (aunts uncles nieces nephews) that would participate on the show if selected? If so how old are they? How many boys ages 18-25 are in your family?

item.title: We Need Real People
item.description:
Topic #1 -- "How Far Would You Go To Get a 2nd Chance?!" Would you suck on a stranger's toe, run outside naked, or get a tattoo of their name on your face just to get them back?? If you would do ANYTHING to get them back you could be a guest! If you or someone you know are so desperate to have a second chance with the person you lost, we want to help rekindle the lost love. Our producers are looking for crazy in love guests to help. Write to us with the subject line: "2nd Chance" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem. *** If you know someone who could fit this story, give us their name and phone number and if they make it to air we will write you a check! ****
Topic #2 -- "Reality Check: What He Really Thinks About You!" Are you a woman that needs to get to the bottom of what he really thinks? Whether you are in a relationship or desperately trying to be in one with him, we want to help show you want he REALLY THINKS! Our producers are ready to get to the bottom of it with help from our experts. Write to us with the subject line: "Reality Check" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem. *** If you know someone who could fit this story, give us their name and phone number and if they make it to air we will write you a check! ****
Topic #3 -- "Bedroom Wars" Has the sex become lame and boring? Are you or your mate constantly complaining about the dry lovemaking? Do you want to spice it up in an extreme way? Our producers want to help address these bedroom nightmares you could be having with help from our experts. Write to us with the subject line: "Bedroom Wars" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem. *** If you know someone who could fit this story, give us their name and phone number and if they make it to air we will write you a check! ****
Topic #4 -- "They Hate My Odd Mate" Do your friends or family think you can do WAY better than who you are with?? Maybe they complain about their weight, clothing style or attitude? Our producers want to help change their minds with a 1-minute makeover that will get them off your back. Write to us with the subject line: "Odd Mate" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem. *** If you know someone who could fit this story, give us their name and phone number and if they make it to air we will write you a check! ****
Topic #5 -- "I Would Do Anything To Be Liked By Them" How far would you go to be liked by a person or a group? Do you or someone you know have problems with "mean" girls or guys? Have you been asked to do an extremely gross or embarrassing thing? Are you fed-up with the way your friends are treating people? Write to us with the subject like: "Anything To Fit In" Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem. *** If you know someone who could fit this story, give us their name and phone number and if they make it to air we will write you a check! ****

item.title: TV CASTING
item.description:
Have you been dreaming about your big day since you can remember, and you're ready to put those plans in place? Are you planning your dream wedding, while still searching for your dream guy?
Maybe you're extremely ambitious, and believe you can do anything when you set a deadline and put your mind to it. Maybe you're of a more spiritual mindset and believe that by putting your positive energy into action, the universe will yield your desired results.
Whatever your story, we want to follow you on your journey!
CASTING NEW DOCU-SERIES FOR MAJOR CABLE NETWORK We are looking for dynamic, attractive single women who are determined to find Mr. Right and make their wedding dreams come true -- and they are taking steps to make it happen!

item.title: Adult Film Female Casting
item.description:
Empire Films South is always interested in contracting with new talent who meet our strict criteria. You must be over the age of 18, caucasian, extremely good looking, intelligent and graceful; previous experience is not required. Empire Films South employs the services of top professionals, models, actresses, adult film stars and sensual massage professionals.
You must love to travel and have no restriction on your ability to travel. Inner beauty is of the utmost importance. In addition it is important that you are comfortable in all social situations and you can carry your self with confidence and class at all times.
If you feel you meet this criteria and are an aspiring female 18 to 27 years old and have a good camera presence or have ever thought of starting a career in the adult industry, then we would like to speak to you. Empire Films South is 100% professional, discreet, serious and confidential. This is a perfect opportunity for those that want to do something fun and exciting in addition to their regular job, for the college student or for anyone that wants to try something different.
Bio Requirements  You are asked to provide a short bio as part of your application. Please provide details about your experience, goals, reasons for applying, or any other relevant information. Please err on the side of providing more info rather than less. Also, don't make it sound like a personal ad.
Provide 4 Different Photos (or more!)  At least four photos are required for applications. No duplicates, re-crops, or manipulations of the same image.
Quality Images Required  We want quality images here. Your photos must be judged to be of sufficient quality.
No Fakes  We take copyright laws very seriously here. If your photos or profile appear to be the work of someone else, you will be denied. This includes fake tear sheets, advertisements, and magazine covers using existing trademarks.
Model Requirements
Show Us Your Face  Your portfolio must show your face clearly.
Show Us All of You  Please include at least 1 full length body shot. Nudes not required.

item.title: Series
item.description:
Are you a gay or lesbian individual who needs help revealing your sexual identity to your loved ones?
Do you live everyday feeling trapped in your skin?
Do you fear how society and/or your loved ones might react if they knew your true sexual identity?
If so, come be a part of our docu-series, where together with a licensed therapist you can sit down with your loved ones and reveal your sexual identity.
By being a part of this docu-series you can help to free many other LGBT individuals who struggle everyday keeping their true sexual identity hidden from their loved ones.
BE COURAGEOUS!
!!!Take part in a MOVEMENT in your LGBT community!!!
"It is ok to feel fear, as long as you don't let fear stop you"

item.title: MTV CASTING
item.description:
MTV - NOW CASTING - "I HAVE A SECRET ONLINE PROFILE"
Are you currently using a fake profile on sites or phone apps like Facebook, Twitter, OkCupid, TextPlus, Blendr, Grindr, Tumblr, Plenty of Fish, etc?? Has someone fallen for your online alter-ego?
Do you spend hours talking or texting with someone you met online? Are you afraid to meet them because you haven't been completely honest?
Are you in a long distance relationship with someone you've never actually met in person? Have you been holding something back from them... are you keeping a secret?
Do you make excuses for not meeting in person because you've been avoiding telling them something? Are you afraid they won't accept you for who you really are?
Do you have a talent for creating believable fake profiles but have gotten in too deep?
Are you currently using a fake profile to get to know someone you have a crush on... or to keep track of an ex or someone your ex left you for?
Do you need help figuring out the best way to finally tell them the truth? Are you looking for a safe way to explain yourself and reveal the real you?
Everyone has a story to share... If ANY of these scenarios sound like you or someone you know, then MTV wants to hear your story! We're here to offer support and guidance along the way.

Are you struggling to make your TWO FAMILIES ONE? Is there CONSTANT FIGHTING between the two sets of KIDS? Do you feel DISCONNECTED from each other? Need some HARMONY???
Believe it or not, having consistent FAMILY DINNER CAN HELP!
Powderhouse Productions, in association with the non-profit The Family Dinner Project, is looking for RECENTLY BLENDED FAMILIES from all walks of life who NEED the help and support of experts in putting their families back together!
Families that are chosen for this MAJOR CABLE NETWORK TV SHOW will be COMPENSATED and SUPPLIED with everything they need to jumpstart their family dinner experience: recipes, activities, expert advice, groceries and more.
Having dinner together as a family CAN CHANGE EVERYTHING!
If you and your family are interested in being considered for this project PLEASE CONTACT US FOR DETAILS ASAP!

item.title: Hit TV Show
item.description:
Topic #1 -- "Parents Who Cross The Line" Are you and your spouse at odds over how to raise your kids? Do you get criticized for the way you discipline your kids? Do you know someone who allows their children to have party, drink, or have sex at home? Are you upset with the way someone in your family is raising their kids? If so, we want to hear your story. . . Write to us with the subject line: "Extreme Parents" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #2 -- "I Would Do Anything To Fit It" How far have you gone to fit in with a group? Do you or someone you know have problems fitting into a certain social groups, clubs, gangs? Do you know someone who will do anything to fit in and you want to confront them? Have you had to perform extreme acts or tasks to be a part of a group? Do you want to confront someone who made you perform a extreme task, and still didn't accept you? If you want to share your story. . . Write to us with the subject line: "Anything To Fit In" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #3 -- "Reality Check: What He Really Thinks About You!" Have you ever said, " I have no idea what my man thinks"? Do you really want to know what's on your man's mind? Does your man talk in circles? Do you feel like your woman never let's you get a word in, or doesn't understand you? We are looking for couples who want to break down the wall of communication! If you are ready to really get your point across. . .. Write to us with the subject line: "Reality Check" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #4 -- "How Far Would You Go To Get a 2nd Chance?!" Do you want a second chance at love? Are you willing to jump out a plane, get a tattoo or eat something gross to prove your love? If you would do ANYTHING to get them back you could be a guest! If you or someone you know are so desperate to have a second chance with the person you lost, we want to help rekindle the lost love. Our producers are looking for crazy in love guests to help. Write to us with the subject line: "2nd Chance" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #5 -- "Contest: Special Talents!" Do you have a special talent? Can jump rope with spaghetti? Or sing Opera in drag? Or maybe even blow fire from your nose? Do you want to confront anyone that thinks you're crazy or that doesn't even call it a talent? We want to showcase your most special talents on our show and prove to them that it is talent! Our producers are looking for guest with special talents!. Write to us with the subject line: "Special Talents" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #6 -- "Look-a-Likes! Who Do You Think You Are?!" Do you or someone you know look so much like a celebrity that it is causing problems in your life? Are you a look-a-like and your partner is feud up with you pretending to be someone else? If you know anyone that is either obsessed with being a look-a-like or hates being a look-a-like, we want to hear your story! Write to us with the subject line: "Look-a-Like" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #7 -- "Twins, Triplets & Quads At War!" Do you having double, triple or quadruple trouble with your identical twin siblings?? Maybe you are tired of being blamed and confused for the things they have done. If you are at odds with your identical siblings, we want to hear your story. Write to us with the subject line: "Identical Sibling Rivalry" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #8 -- "Groupies & Baller Followers" Are you or someone you know a proud and infamous baller groupie?? Do they follow ball players all around the country trying to catch their interest and if lucky, get pregnant!? Are you upset because your friend is chasing men for the wrong reason? If you're ready to confront a friend or loved one about the groupie ways, we want to hear your story. Write to us with the subject line: "Groupies" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.
Topic #9 -- "Bedroom Wars" Are you bored with your sex life? Are you or your mate constantly complaining about too much sex, not enough sex, or lame sex? Do you want to spice it up in the bedroom, but want some help? If you're a couple that his ready to talk about sex, we want to hear your story. Write to us with the subject line: "Bedroom Wars" to be considered. Include phone numbers for direct contact and a brief line about your problem.

item.title: something dangerous
item.description:
Casting Call: Are you ingesting something dangerous and need help?
A documentary series is currently looking for individuals who are ingesting dangerous, non-food items to share their story and receive professional treatment.
This series allows individuals that have uncontrollable urges to eat, drink and consume non-food items the chance to discuss their addiction in a safe and comforting manner.
If you or someone you know is ingesting: - wood - metal - magnetic material - cleansers - hair / beauty products - toxic chemicals - other items not listed
Please reach out to us. We can help!
Many undetected medical conditions can cause individuals to want to consume non-food items. Our team of professionals can help you get your life and your health back on track!

item.title: Free Thinking Families
item.description:
LOOKING FOR FAMILIES IN THE ATLANTA AREA WHO ARE AGNOSTIC/ATHEIST OR FREE THINKERS!!
Major cable network is looking for outgoing & outspoken non-religious families in the Atlanta area to star in a brand new documentary TV series.
We are especially interested in families with children who would be willing to share with and learn from other families.
All types of families are encouraged to apply (traditional, non-traditional, single parents, same sex, etc.)
If you've ever thought your family should be on TV now's your chance.

item.title: Interview subjects needed
item.description: Atlanta area author/producer is interested in interviewing persons who have suffered setbacks (unemployment, home foreclosure, bankruptcy) during the economic crisis of the last few years (The Great Recession). Interview sessions will be a minimum of one hour long and will be used as source material for a book and possible documentary. The sessions may be conducted either in person or by phone.

item.title: Athletic Models Needed
item.description:
TalentSoup is casting for athletic models (and all you buff actors) for a print shoot shooting in Atlanta All talent must be signed up in TalentSoup to be submitted. It's fast and free. Go to www.talentsoup.com/signup and follow the directions.
The search is constrained to within 100 miles of Atlanta so if you are outside that area, simply change your address to Atlanta, GA to be included in the casting.
Pro Webcomp talent are paid $2000 for a booking, Entry (free account) are paid $1600.
Your Webcomp portfolio must include shots of you in athletic gear. The client needs to see your body and movement in your photos. If you are in the Soup and fit the criteria, you'll be submitted automatically as always!
